sentence: On Wednesday, the White House sent letters to Dr Mehmet Oz and former football star Herschel Walker – two Republican Senate candidates in Pennsylvania and Georgia, respectively – asking them to submit their resignations or face termination.
author: Maya Yang
title: White House tells Dr Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from fitness council

sentence: The White House requested Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker, who are now Republican Senate candidates in Pennsylvania and Georgia, respectively, to step down from their positions as the administration forbids federal candidates to be members of presidential boards.
author: Joseph Gobran
title: Dr. Oz And Herschel Walker Asked By White House To Step Down Or Be Fired, Both Were Trump Appointees

sentence: WASHINGTON – The Biden administration requested the resignation of Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz from the President’s Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition Wednesday night, saying they would be fired if they did not do so.
author: David Epstein
title: Elena Delle Donne, José Andrés to replace Herschel Walker and Dr. Oz on fitness council

sentence: President Joe Biden's administration sent letters to television personality Dr. Mehmet Oz and former NFL player Herschel Walker Wednesday, asking them to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition or be terminated by the end of the day.
author: Lauren Frias
title: Biden asked Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from a presidential council or be terminated

sentence: This is truly a smart and good meme, because Dr. Mehmet Oz sold good patriotic lifesaving snake oil on the Oprah Winfrey show, while Dr. Fauci tyrannically asked Americans to get vaccinated against a deadly pandemic and to wear masks on their faces, which liberty-loving human beings simply cannot do.
author: Doktor Zoom
title: Biden Shitcans Jerk GOP Losers From Fitness Council And They Will Not Shut Up

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz, a candidate for U.S. senator and host of the long-running "The Dr. Oz Show," was fired from a presidential council, according to a statement released Wednesday by his campaign.
author: Chelsey Cox
title: Senate candidate and TV host Dr. Oz removed from presidential fitness council
